lender.name: Fredrik

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I adhere to the ethic of reciprocity.

lender.name: Elisha
lender.loan_because: I like the fact I can see my money is making a difference in someone's life, and in the lives of the people in their community.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an editor at a newspaper.

lender.name: Michelle

lender.name: Sicco van Hoegee
lender.loan_because: They deserve our help to build their own future!
lender.occupational_info: Working with a dream team on challeging projects!

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: Everything I've heard about micro loans show that they're incredibly effective at helping people in poverty improve their circumstances. They also allow people without a lot of money to give make a meaningful positive difference in someone's life. Go Kiva!!
lender.occupational_info: I perform music on mandolin and violin in several different styles....classical, Brazilian and jazz.

lender.loan_because: I too will borrow, and have borrowed from society.

lender.loan_because: I belive that helping each other is the best way to make the world a better place, if we have the opportunity to make a difference in this world we should not let it slip by

lender.occupational_info: In the last few years all online casinos have added a number video slot machines with advanced graphics, game play, and functions. The free slots games seem to be extremely popular amongst online slots players.

lender.name: Darryl
lender.loan_because: To be able to help people & communities in less fortunate countries and area's is a god given right! Most people can spare a little cash - what a great feeling knowing you can make a real difference!

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: It is in my heart :)
lender.occupational_info: Wellness care.....naturally

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: we are none of us alone, we are all connected, we help ourselves by helping each other.
lender.occupational_info: I help people heal naturally.

lender.name: Darlington Crew
lender.loan_because: Because we are lucky to have each other and want to share our good fortune.

lender.name: Sarah

lender.name: Katelyn
lender.loan_because: This helps people to earn there income and better there situations, which then helps their communites.

lender.name: Arethusa Group
lender.loan_because: This goes so much farther than anything else.
lender.occupational_info: We're a new renaissance and world music group. Every few gigs we set up another loan! Believe me, if struggling musicians can do this; you can. Imagine running a business in a Third World country, small change makes good things happen!

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It is a worthy cause and I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I repair laptops and desktops.

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: My Work? Driving a truck across the USA. Very boring and low paying.

lender.name: Tomasz
lender.loan_because:
I'm grateful for what I have and want to express my love to others. I hope you'll all succeed.
I want to be an enterpreneur, and at some point I'll need help too. And after all - what we reap is what we sow.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a software engineer. At the moment I'm working on antivirus software which protects computers against malicious internet users. Number of computer related threats is incredible!

lender.name: WawaJeanne
lender.loan_because: I'm a firm believer in 'teaching a man to fish'
lender.occupational_info: I study what happens to the traffic when you build more houses or stores, but I'd rather be making food for a living.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: There is so little better to do with my money.
lender.occupational_info: I build walls that you can see through.

lender.name: MICHELLE
lender.loan_because: I would rather help someone who needs it instead of spending on things I don't need.
lender.occupational_info: Sales assistant to a Financial Consultant at a Securities Firm.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it's the least a slacker like me can do to make the world a better place

lender.name: Hamill Family
lender.loan_because: We believe in sharing opportunity with others. Offering help to another person is very gratifying. Seeing someone change their own life using our little bit of help is a wonderful gift.
lender.occupational_info: health care

lender.name: Amy K
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Cassandre
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world

lender.name: Timothy
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at poly.

lender.name: mohammed
lender.loan_because: I want to continuou my education to the university successfully.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because:
I want people to maintain their dignity and pride while striving for a better future for themselves, their family, and in the end, their community. Also, I want to share my many blessings with my fellow Filipinos.
"Thousands of candles can be lit from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared. (G. Siddharta)
In the midst of chaos and turmoil, inspires self reflection and admiration of the lotus flower, arising from the muddy waters reaching out its petals to the eternal sky. Once more, reminding us of hope's unwavering existence.
lender.occupational_info: I help people smile.

lender.name: mark
lender.loan_because: Charity is evil.
lender.occupational_info: I design many products that people use in their daily lives.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: as part of the Global community, we are responsible for assisting and providing opportunities to people with fantastic ideas and energy, but lack the funding to simply "make it happen".

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I recently visited Cambodia and was impressed with the will of the people. I enjoy helping others.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I saw a photo of the earth from outer space. There are no national boundaries. We are all of one family, and of course, one helps one's family members.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.occupational_info: I am a 20-year-old psychology student who is looking to make a difference, even if just a small one, in the lives of others.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: kiva == win
lender.occupational_info: I work on credit risk management applications for a multinational investment bank. In my spare time I build RESTful web-services which decouple client-side markup from server code (ie: I make the internets go).

lender.name: TheDecorno
lender.loan_because: I want to help, and Kiva makes this so easy.
lender.occupational_info: I work in retail, so I buy products for my company to sell.

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: I think people who are able to should help others.

lender.name: Amherst Microfinance
lender.loan_because: We want to help people lift themselves out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of students at Amherst College in the United States.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: I like to send my love out in the world, and watch it spread. It's also a way for me to give back to the Universe, and to say thank you for the abundance I have in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a healer and an advocate. I work with women and families to help them be emotionally and physically more healthy during pregnancy, to give birth safely and to recover well afterward.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I fly airplanes.

lender.name: Rob
lender.occupational_info: I write jokes for a famous person to tell on TV.

lender.name: Kacz Family
lender.loan_because: My family can make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Pediatric medicine

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I do not have a lot of money to give, but the entrepreneurs at Kiva do not need a lot of money to make big things happen.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying for a Master's of Arts in Urban Planning.

lender.name: j.hart
lender.loan_because: I believe in freedom and capitalism, and want to be a good steward of all I've been blessed with.

lender.name: liyana
lender.occupational_info: My first part-time job was a kindergarten teacher. For two years I worked as a kindergarten teacher, there was not even a day that I did not feel nervous. Handling kids aged 2-6 years old in which they can be very demanding made me nervous. Plus, there are someone else’s child. Talking about responsibility? Beyond imagination. During my course of studying marketing, I worked part-time for various companies majorly event companies. Most of my job area would be in marketing communication and promotional events. Although I must say it’s challenging and fun, the only drawback is I have to work during the weekends. My first full-time job was with an advertising company as an Accounts Executive. My job was to find clients and pitch for clients to take up the company’s deal. It was not an easy job. Then, I moved to PETRONAS , Malaysia’s owned oil and gas company. I was working with the International Trading Corporation, under Supply, Operations and Logistics Department. My work is to engage with clients buying chemical products from PETRONAS trading it to other major players within the oil and gas industry. Supplying to customers chemical product, handling vessel and trucking logistics ensuring products reach to the customers as promised. Sounds very complex? It’s not. Technically, I’m still working with PETRONAS as I took a year leave to fly myself to Melbourne and pursue MBA.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: Kiva provides an opportunities for people to better themselves and others.

lender.name: Alfine
lender.loan_because: of the satisfaction I get from knowing that I'm able to help someone in more need of money than I am.
lender.occupational_info: I do not only believe in love, nonjudgment, patience, generosity and other relative qualities, but I believe in BEING these things in order to DO things that reflect such beliefs.

lender.name: vanesa
lender.loan_because: we need to fund people's dreams and help make them realities
lender.occupational_info: i help clients make their events what they had envisioned, from the flavors to the decor

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I'm interested to see how this process works. I also was based out of Nicaragua for a year in 1996, working as a journalist - so I want to give back to a place that was so good to me.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university now, but for many years I was a reporter. I wrote stories about all sorts of people. In 1996, I was based in Managua and I wrote about the presidential elections and many other issues facing the country.

lender.name: Gene & Irene
lender.occupation: Working hard, most of the time :)

lender.name: Sheri
lender.loan_because: It feels good. It feels right.
lender.occupational_info: I write books that make children happy.

lender.name: salem
lender.loan_because: Allah told us to help the poor people
lender.occupational_info: Allah create all people from Adam and create Adam from clay so we all one And Allah says do for your life as you are staying long and do for your end as you are dying tomorrow

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Elise
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little love and help so loan on Kiva ... or kiss a chicken!
lender.occupational_info: I go to a Japanese immersion school. I want to be an artist and have people see my work and think wow! Since artists don't make much money, I'd also like to be a scientist.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: It makes sense

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: It is form of ministry and worship for me. I can reach out to the poor of the world in a very tangible way while still following my calling in the United States.
lender.occupational_info: I have been blessed with resources. I am not rich by American standards, but to the global standard, I am very wealthy. How wrong is it for me to hoard my wealth to myself while knowing that there are people in this world who are trapped in poverty and I have the ability to give them freedom? I must be a steward with the money God has blessed me with so that I can serve others as well.

lender.name: Shilo & Shaun
lender.loan_because: We have everything we need, really.

lender.name: Sherie
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others and share what I have.

lender.name: Jeff Rose
lender.loan_because: I think entrepreneurs are the engine of a healthy, growing economy, and I want to help people in the developing world who weren't born as lucky as I was.
lender.occupational_info: I write all kinds of computer software, from web sites and databases to digital musical instruments and live 3D graphics systems.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: If I can help Ford sell more cars and trucks, I can help you sell more fruits and vegetables and textiles and things your community needs.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze web sites to help Ford sell more cars and trucks.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's wonderful that money I can share comes back to be re-lent to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a supervisor in a factory.

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate to have a good home, good food, a good job, and compared to most people needing help, an abundance of everything and I want to help others, even if it's just a little bit.
lender.occupational_info: I play a small two row accordion on the streets of Austin, Texas for tips. I also work for the state of Texas government as a Systems Analyst.

lender.occupational_info: Kiva Ravenna è nata nel Novembre 2008 con lo scopo di promuovere il sistema di microcredito sviluppato da KIVA.ORG e per unire tutti coloro che a Ravenna e dintorni sono sostenitori di Kiva

lender.name: Lynde
lender.loan_because: People need my money more than I do.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: of the enormous disparity between the developed and the developing world. I believe it is my responsibility to share what I have in an effective and efficient way as is provided by Kiva.

lender.occupational_info: Single with a small cheerful dog, and no job.

lender.occupational_info: As I'm retired I like spending my time working in my flower garden,and spending time with my husband and family and friends.

lender.name: Cecilia
lender.loan_because: I think this is a splendid idea!

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I've had hard times and there were people to help me. Now that I'm in a better position, I'd like to pay it forward.

lender.name: nodeposit
lender.occupational_info: A large number of no deposit casinos give players free chips to play casino games. We provide you information on which no deposit casinos will give you free bonuses without having to purchase in order to test the casino software.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a hand at sometime
lender.occupational_info: I choose new products for my company to sell, then find ways to sell them!

lender.name: Stacey & Patrick
lender.loan_because: we're able.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I loan because when I needed help I was lucky enough to receive loans to go to college. Now, I hope that by lending I'm helping other people make their dreams come true.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Stephane
lender.loan_because: I care to uphold every person's right to pursue happiness.
lender.occupational_info: I test software projects in my company to make sure requirements and specifications are met. I also try to bring continuous improvements in quality.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to support small buisnesses in developing countries
lender.occupational_info: I´m studying to become a scientist in linguistics

lender.name: Charlene
lender.loan_because: I'm thankful for my job, and am so happy to join a worldwide network of people making jobs for themselves possible.
lender.occupational_info: I work in New York City, at a cooperatively run grocery store, owned by more than 15,000 working members. We keep our prices very low because our members do most of the labor at our Coop (that keeps our expenses much lower than most stores). In order to shop here, you must be a member and to be a member, you have to agree to work for 2.75 hours once every 4 weeks. I am one of only 65 paid staff people and I help to coordinate the labor, answer member questions, I perform administrative jobs like process the payroll, and a lot of other information management.

lender.name: Niall
lender.occupational_info: I am an undergraduate student at Churchill College, Cambridge in the United Kingdom.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: Empowering people with the chance to improve their lives as other people have done for me.

lender.name: Jenni
lender.occupation: Help me by donating today: http://apps.facebook.co

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: I really like the concept of micro loans. I think it's the best way for small businesses in developing countries to expand. The benefits flow from the owners, through to many others in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently completing my International Studies degree while managing a wine store in New York city.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping. I think micro-loans are brilliant!
lender.occupational_info: I teach music in a high school. I also perfom early music (recorder player)

lender.name: cal
lender.loan_because: i want to encourage kind people who are working in non-violent and peaceful ways--good for humans, good for animals, and good for plants.
lender.occupational_info: i share yoga with my community

lender.name: Manuel & Matilde
lender.loan_because: We traditionally donated to emergency appeals for countries suffering from national or human disasters: Pakistan earthquake, Darfur, Congo, etc. Now we decided to join microfinance schemes as we do agree with recent social developing theories that something needs to be done to improve government to government funding.

lender.name: Hiroshi
lender.loan_because: we can change.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I learned about your program in one of my classes and it inspired me to do more!

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I believe people need a hand up.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I believe we all are here to help one another
lender.occupational_info: I work with holistic healing through reiki and herbal healing and maintenance both hands on and distance to attune and heal humans and animals

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs succeed and help people improve their way of life in other countries

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Human beings are remarkable, we (I) lose sight of that sometimes (often) but given an opportunity, we can do pretty much anything.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people all around the world to play the guitar.

lender.name: Matt T.
lender.loan_because: ... making a difference is not necessarily a broad, sweeping action -- it is many small, consistent actions in our everyday lives.

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the excitement of it all.
lender.occupational_info: I'm interested in how neighborhoods and communities can be reinvigorated through creativity and entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Debi
lender.loan_because: I care about other struggling individuals in other countries, they are trying to make there lives better for themselves and their families, just as we do. To lend a helping hand to others is a basic human experience, if each one helped one what an amazing change we could make.
lender.occupational_info:
As a Realtor I help people purchase and sell homes, a grand experience when someone finds a place to call home.
As a Interior Designer, I help them decorate there home with there style.

lender.name: Paul & Amy
lender.loan_because: I loan because these entrepreneurs strive to change their lives without a sense of entitlement and embody the American spirit with a greater intensity than most of those that claim need within the USA. Plus it’s good karma…

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I'd like to remember my uncle Gene's generous spirit and love of travel in East Asia.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a museum that teaches adults and children how art can be a part of their lives and show them different ways of thinking about the world.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Microcredit can foster Economic Development and give hope to people that are less fortunate than we are.
lender.occupational_info: I am fortunate to have a job I love. I am a Professor at the Robert Kennedy College and, as its founder, an entrepreneur. I do make small (and at times big) changes in the lives of my students and hope to have a positive impact in their career.

lender.name: patrick
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: maelyn
lender.occupational_info: im engaged in a buy and sell business for quite a long time .i need an additional capital for expanding our business my husband and i would like to put up an aggregates business where in we got contacts from the local developer ,contractors of different contstruction projects .we wants as well to manufacture or to have our own hollow blocks making to supply for the contstruction projects here in our pace.

lender.name: ashley
lender.loan_because: If your in need in a serious way-I'll give what im able to give!
lender.occupational_info: Just a small town country girl who has the heart for the big cites. I do what others wont-or dont want to do.If i need money or want to get the bills paid then i gotta do something to provide-so what im saying is im not worried about getting my hands dirty or someone eles!

lender.name: Jeneba
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate to be able to work hard and see the fruits of my labor. I want to share this feeling with other hardworking people.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: it is important to give back. always.
lender.occupational_info: i'm a student in Chicago - from Boston originally.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I care about families around the world
lender.occupational_info: I teach students the world is much larger than they are and they can share in another person's life

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: My faith tells me that the best way to lift someone out of despair is to give them the tools and means to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: While internet marketing is my career, it does not define my life. I define myself as a husband, father, friend to many, historian, inquisitive student, and world traveler.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: My husband is a KF9 Kiva fellow in Rwanda, and I believe in what he is doing.
lender.occupational_info: I perform in theater and film, because it is fun, and because the projects are meaningful to me.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I am fairly poor myself, but I think it is important to help foster a foundation of solidarity that transcends borders and cultural differences.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student currently with aspirations of becoming a teacher. My passion is music

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Mathematics, Statistics and Computer Science to first and second year University students.

lender.name: Wendy R Wolf
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity to make a difference for real people.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people connect with themselves, with others, and with Spirit.

lender.name: michaela
lender.loan_because: a helping hand can make a difference

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I am only one, but I am one....~Edward Everett Hale

lender.name: Therese
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I run medical tests on patients

lender.name: Greg and Ivy
lender.loan_because: My parents had a small catering business when I was a child. I remember how hard we all worked to build the business and how much fun we had working as a team. As the business grew my mom was able to hire friends, family and neighbors to help with baking, sandwich assembly, food delivery, and more. After seeing first-hand how a thriving small business spread wealth and opportunity to our community, I want to help other families make their business dreams a reality.

lender.name: Peter Cohen
lender.loan_because: I asked my family to contribute to those in need instead of me.
lender.occupational_info: Photographer-Artist

lender.name: Tengis
lender.loan_because: I believe in the future of Mongolia!

lender.name: Haley
lender.loan_because: my parents taught me to have an independent entreprenuer spirit, and there are lots of those types out there. I want to help there dreams come true. We all need a little help to get off the ground and running.

lender.name: Ita
lender.loan_because: I need money to rent a stand to have a small store of accessories (e.g: hair pins, handphone case) and fancy stationaries.
lender.occupational_info: I want to have my own bussiness (tobe an enterpreneur) to support my family. I have 2 children and can't only depend on my salary as a teacher. I really worry about their future with very expensive cost for education.

lender.name: Joe
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineer who designs the electrical system for heavy duty trucks.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Wealth is inequitably distributed and everyone on earth should work to change that. Everyone deserves a shot.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: my money is not my own. How can I not give back when I have received so freely from the hand of God?
lender.occupational_info: I work for an open source software technology called Liferay. One of the greatest things about my company is that giving back to the community is one of its main goals and passions!

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Glendora
lender.loan_because: my heart tells me to.

lender.name: Nikhol
lender.loan_because: I've been given a lot of opportunities and now it's time to give back
lender.occupational_info: Managing my programs is like managing my own small company.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I've been extraordinarily lucky and blessed in my life, and I want to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pagan, poet, and writer living on a small, family-owned hobby farm in central Massachusetts.

lender.name: Jake
lender.loan_because: I wish to share what I have been blessed with.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student that during breaks in schooling has the opportunity to work construction on residential homes.

lender.name: Alvaro
lender.loan_because: I can. I should.

lender.name: KEENAN
lender.loan_because: It help put my world into perspective
lender.occupational_info: I stare at computer screens and tap buttons

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Lup told them to.
lender.occupational_info: Chef.

lender.name: Wim
lender.loan_because: I like to help people that are determined to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: my work involves changing companies so that they deliver better products and services, have happier customers & staff, and earn more money.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because:
I believe in the underdog and the entrepreneurial spirit.
The United States may be undergoing a "financial crisis," but this pales in comparison to the day-to-day living of those graciously represented on Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am working on my Literature degree, and my skills with the written word.

lender.name: Arnstein Larsen
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepeneurs build an income to support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I'm head of a business unit selling internet (broadband) services to residential users.

lender.name: andre
lender.loan_because: 1 year ago I started a business credit mobile phone ownership with capital loaned by a friend, 4 months running a successful business, been running 5 to start a business due to bad debts distracted from its consumers. now I am confused and a lot of debt to return the money that I borrow from a friend. I have been trying to sell my motorcycle, but less than sufficient funds to restore the money that I borrow from a friend. but I do not give up because I want to start a new business that is a distributor of rice, and I need a capital of Rp. 25,000,000, or approximately USD $ 2500 to start this business. I currently have 3 people brother who is still only school while my mother worked as a factory worker, while my father unemployment. I already 2 months this is not worked and threatened the sack from work because of corporate efficiency. Now I hope there is a benefactor willing to give loans that will change the very meaning of life for my family and start a beautiful life.
lender.occupational_info: For the rice distribution business that will I do, I already have a partner working in Klaten as rice, while my job is looking for buyers and deliver the order to the buyer until the rice. capital needed to rent a truck and operational, for a while, I will rent a truck and I hope that if the business is running smoothly within 1 year I can already buy their own trucks for this business

lender.name: Jaish
lender.loan_because: I found the whole idea of Microcredit and micro funding by Kiva very interesting. I chose to loan through Kiva because it is easy and hassle-free and more importantly it satisfies my urge of doing something as a socially responsible netizen.
lender.occupational_info: Senior Administrator at Robert Kennedy College, Zurich, Switzerland

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: i received a Kiva gift certificate from my friends Annarose and Charles. What a wonderful way to help others help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: People, Purpose, Progress: Helping leaders and teams clarify purpose, then make progress in turning their vision into reality.

lender.name: Haakon
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a computer science department. My tasks include programming, running servers, helping scientists with various projects, and so on.

lender.name: Alpha Lambda Omega
lender.loan_because: To support entrepreneurship of woman in developing countries through ongoing funding of businesses that improve the standard of living for woman and their families.
lender.occupational_info: We are a fellowship of woman concerned about having a positive impact on communities through service to all mankind.

lender.name: Diane
lender.occupation: Retired Legislative Advocate, California State Department of Education

lender.name: Martin
lender.occupational_info: I am a journalist working on Africa and have seen what micro-finance can do. Business men and women from Africa can really change the fate of the continent!

lender.name: RnBstyles
lender.occupational_info: R&B is a stylish men's jewelry & accessories brand

lender.name: Jeff and Lorraine
lender.loan_because: Jeff: I love the concept of Kiva. I'ts hard to describe how empowering it feels to me so I can't imagine how it must feel to these amazing people trying to make a difference to themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Jeff: Creative Lorraine: Caring

lender.name: Cee
lender.loan_because: I plant seeds

lender.name: Miguel and Sandy
lender.loan_because: One of life’s great classrooms is traveling to different cultures, learning, observing and always coming away fed beyond words! Having traveled to many of the countries where Kiva is established, a consistent realization is that we all are more similar than we are different regardless of the miles between us. Giving back and lending a helping hand is one of the greatest pleasures in life. We are so thankful for all the help we have been given along life’s path and are so happy we are able to help others with their dreams!! Thank you Kiva for making this happen.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: it the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I help build libraries. I am also going to school to learn how to become a librarian.

lender.name: Jess
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed, and I recognize the fact that what I have isn't truly mine. I need to give to others just as my blessings have been given to me.
lender.occupational_info: I design websites, print products, clothing and also do illustration. I also sew all of the clothing I design.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I beleive that Americans have a moral obligation to do what they personally can to help the world's poor
lender.occupational_info: I work for the largest wine company in the world. I lead a team focused on ensuring our people remain at the center of our business strategies and solutions

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I can and to help others change their lives

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I am a caregiver and educator for twin internationally adopted boys, whose parents have jobs that require they be away from their home for most of the day.

lender.name: Erin
lender.occupational_info: I help to edit books about travel.

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: I have a genuine interest in helping others live better lives. Money should never get in the way of a person's happiness.

lender.name: Mica
lender.occupational_info: I am a student interested in international human rights, and development.
